When fully expanded the SPRs are systems, tasks , functions, actions, users, and even ai, wait what?  Yeah SPRs...they are a super advanced and space saving way to get the most for that are naming conventions, an object metadata who's metadata is compressed back into the object so it's like a Russian doll you open it up and there's another one underneath and another one underneath until you get to the smallest component or function or the base layer. So SPRs carry weight, in a great way, think about it not requiring a "$" to give it away nor it be define
